# Clean Package Executor

## `outputPath`
- **Type**: `string`
- **Default**: `"dist/{projectRoot}"`

> Output Path


The path to the output


## `packageJsonPath`
- **Type**: `string`
- **Default**: `"{outputPath}/package.json"`

> Package JSON Path


The path to the package.json that will be modified


## `ignoredFiles`
- **Type**: `string`

> Ignored Files


The files to ignore


## `fields`
- **Type**: `string`
- **Default**: `[]`

> Fields


The fields to include


## `cleanReadMe`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `true`

> Clean Read Me


Clean the read me


## `cleanComments`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `true`

> Clean Comments


Clean the comments
